Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.chat

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.chat.Chat
public final class Chat extends Object
Provides easier String and minecraft chat manipulations.

    • makeStringFractional

      @Nonnull public static String makeStringFractional(int current, int max)
      Returns a colored fractional string with the following format: 
          current/max

      The color of the current is base on a percent.

      Parameters:
      current - - Current.
      max - - Max
      Returns:
      a colored string.

    • makeStringCommaAnd

      @Nonnull public static <T> String makeStringCommaAnd(@Nonnull Collection<T> collection, @Nonnull Function<T,String> fn)
      Makes a string from the given collection, following the format: 
           First, Second, Third and Fourth

      Meaning appends commands between each element except the last one, where and is used instead of commad.

      Parameters:
      collection - - Collection.
      fn - - Function.
      Returns:
      a string.
